title: SoC SAI 401-0-23 Topics in Sound Production
topic: Sound Walks, Audio Tours, and Augmented Reality

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: This course is an investigation of the relationship of sound and geography. We will explore the techniques, art, and theory of field recording, soundwalks, audio tours, and augmented reality. Through readings, discussions, and recording projects, students will gain a greater understanding of how sound can be integrated into our physical environment. Additionally, we will cover advanced recording and editing techniques using Pro Tools and new GPS-aware audio tour software called Detour.
